rows.label: tlk41200122_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Peace is the best, isn't it!
Everyone should be soothed by Armu!

rows.label: tlk41200122_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Armu have a nice natural scent, and if you ride
on their backs, you'll fall right asleep!

rows.label: tlk41200122_05_msg0003
rows.name:
That's right!
Everyone should raise an Armu!

rows.label: tlk41200122_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Then both Superbia and Invidia will
lose their will to fight!

rows.label: tlk41200122_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Everyone should just relax
with their Armu!

rows.label: tlk41200122_05_msg0006
rows.name:
It's called Armu-therapy, using the full
healing power of the Armu!
